author: 0xblacktemplar
content:
hey, I am currently trying to setup a kiln validator but I always get in the summary of the launchpad Validators: 0. I am using the staking-deposit-cli with the command `docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/validator_keys:/app/validator_keys ethereum/staking-deposit-cli new-mnemonic --chain=kiln --eth1_withdrawal_address 0x... --num_validators 1` I also specified 1 validator on the "Generate Keys" page. Also when I click continue on the summary page I get Confirm deposits (0) NO PENDING DEPOSITS.

Any idea what is going on/what I am doing wrong?
